description.value:
A quick check of your records and local infospheres lets you quickly disseminate information to your allies. Choose a creature within 100 feet and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about the target. When you succeed at identifying your target with Recall Knowledge, you note a resistance or immunity in the creature's defenses in addition to any other benefits.

Lead by Example If you used two actions, you Strike the target. You and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks made by the target until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feat-effects.Item.2Iuhg4udP9eQF3oM]{Effect: Digital Assessment!}

If the target has the tech trait, it must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:envoy|options:inflicts:glitching] save against your class DC. On a failure, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.conditions.Item.6A2QDy8wRGCVQsSd]{Glitching 1}. The target is then immune to Digital Assessment for 1 hour.
